projects.title: Enterprise Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A real-time dashboard for visualizing business KPIs and analytics.
projects.details: This dashboard integrates with multiple data sources (SQL, NoSQL, REST APIs) and provides interactive charts, user management, and export features. Built with React, D3.js, and Node.js. Features include drill-down analytics, exportable reports, and role-based access.

projects.title: AI Chatbot Platform
projects.description: A scalable chatbot platform for automating customer support.
projects.details: The platform leverages NLP and machine learning to provide 24/7 support for e-commerce businesses. Features include conversation analytics, multi-language support, and seamless integration with Slack and Messenger. Built with Python, TensorFlow, and Vue.js.

projects.title: Mobile Banking App
projects.description: A secure mobile app for personal banking and payments.
projects.details: The app offers biometric authentication, instant notifications, and budgeting tools. Developed using Flutter and integrated with secure RESTful APIs for real-time transactions. Includes spending analytics and card management.

projects.title: DevOps Automation Suite
projects.description: A suite of tools for automating CI/CD pipelines.
projects.details: Automates infrastructure provisioning, deployment, and monitoring using Docker, Kubernetes, and GitHub Actions. Includes a dashboard for pipeline visualization and alerting, plus Slack notifications and rollback support.
